languages.text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: In addition to basic Webber attack effects, targets suffer -20 Weapon Skill penalty and cannot perform Attacks of Opportunity for 2 turns.
In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Además de los efectos de los ataques de lanzarredes, el objetivo sufre una penalización de −20 a su Habilidad de armas y no puede lanzar ataques de oportunidad. Estas penalizaciones duran 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Además de los efectos de los ataques de lanzarredes, el objetivo sufre una penalización de −20 a su Habilidad de armas y no puede lanzar ataques de oportunidad. Estas penalizaciones duran 2 asaltos.

languages.text: ウェバーの攻撃効果に加えて、ターゲットは近接攻撃にペナルティ−20を受け、機会攻撃を実行することはできない。このペナルティは2ラウンド続く。
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: ウェバーの攻撃効果に加えて、ターゲットは武器スキルにペナルティ−20を受け、機会攻撃を実行することはできない。このペナルティは2ラウンド続く。

languages.text: 这把武器除了会造成捕网枪的攻击效果之外，还可以使目标的武器技能降低20点，且目标无法发动借机攻击。上述效果持续两轮。
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器除了会造成捕网枪的攻击效果之外，还可以使目标的武器技能降低20点，且目标无法发动借机攻击。上述效果持续两轮。

languages.text: Neben den Angriffseffekten des Netzwerfers wird das Ziel mit einem Abzug von −20 auf Waffenfähigkeit belegt und kann keine Gelegenheitsangriffe ausführen. Diese Abzüge dauern 2 Runden lang an.
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Neben den Angriffseffekten des Netzwerfers wird das Ziel mit einem Abzug von -20 auf Waffenfähigkeit belegt und kann keine Gelegenheitsangriffe ausführen. Diese Abzüge dauern 2 Runden lang an.

languages.text: En plus des effets de l'attaque du lance-toile, la cible subit une pénalité de −20 à sa Capacité de combat et ne peut pas effectuer d'attaques d'opportunité. Ces effets durent 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: En plus des effets de l'attaque du lance-toile, la cible subit une pénalité de −20 à sa Capacité de combat et ne peut pas effectuer d'attaques d'opportunité. Ces effets durent 2 rounds.

languages.text: Кроме обычных эффектов от атаки сетемета цель получает штраф −20 к Ближнему Бою и не может совершать атаки по возможности. Эти штрафы действуют 2 раунда.
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Кроме обычных эффектов от атаки сетемета цель получает штраф −20 к Ближнему Бою и не может совершать атаки по возможности. Эти штрафы действуют 2 раунда.
Кроме обычных эффектов от атаки сетемета цель получает штраф −20 к Ближнему Бою и не может совершать атаки по возможности. Эти штрафы действуют 2 раунда.

languages.text: Ağdolayan saldırı etkilerine ek olarak hedef, Silah Yeteneği niteliğine −20 ceza puanı alır ve fırsat saldırısı gerçekleştiremez. Bu ceza puanları, 2 raunt kalır.
languages.original_text: In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.
